text: Aleksandr Vladimirovich Ivanitsky (; 8 October 1937 - 22 July 2020) was a Soviet wrestler and Olympic champion in Freestyle wrestling. He won a gold medal at the 1964 Summer Olympics. Ivanitsky died on 22 July 2020 from a possible drowning, aged 82.В Подмосковье нашли мертвым олимпийского чемпиона по вольной борьбе Александра Иваницкого ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Accidental deaths by drowning Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet wrestlers
title: Aleksandr Ivanitsky
